p: All analyses were carried out in R (R Core Team, 2015) mainly using the packages raster (Hijmans & van Etten, 2012) for handling of SDM gridded outputs, presenceabsence (Freeman & Moisen, 2008) for calculating TSS and evaluation metrics and nlme (Pinheiro, Bates, DebRoy, Sarkar, & Team, 2015) for LMMs.
